subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN1578 has been delivered
description_text:
Hello, My order has been received and I thank you for offering a substitute part when the original was out of stock and for getting it delivered so quickly. I would like to bring attention to the cost difference between the 2 items. The original order consisted of Pro pedals, base plate, and heel plate which cost $271.80 after discount. The substitute part consisted of Pro Plus Upgrade without base/heel plates which is listed on your website at $237.00. I have overpaid for the item received. I’m also unable to use these pedals on my rig without base/heel plates so I’m left without a working sim rig. Please help! conversations.body_text: 您好，Chris Haemmerle，  We will promptly check whether the baseplate was missed in the shipment and verify the price difference. Once confirmed, we will get back to you as soon as possible.

Hi Chris Haemmerle,  We have just confirmed that the black base plate is currently out of stock at our U.S. warehouse. We expect new stock to arrive soon and will arrange shipment of the base plate to you immediately upon arrival. I'm very sorry for the inconvenience!
